Paris is also Simone de Beauvoir. And what great woman has a bridge? Even such an architecturally elegant one. Fit and proper! And discovered a non-touristy corner of Pars.

Gets you from Bercy to the Bibliotheque National in a Jiffy. Offers a great view over the Seine, with ships passing under the bridge or making their turn here. In the distance the twin towers of Notre Dame with a crane for rebuilding the cathedral. You can observe a beautiful sunset from the bridge, given the right weather. Wonderful location for photographs.
Splendide view. Fresh air. Easy to get there by transportation.
Its an amazing place at night with all the lights ‚Ä¶.

While crossing the bridge I was really interested and impressed by the architecture of the structure, some referring to such a design as ‚Äúaerodynamic‚Äù. It was a very nice experience crossing the bridge since it is actually out of tourists crowds, so it‚Äôs not as popular and therefore not as cramped as the other bridges crossing the Seine. Its a great bridge to take a romantic stroll or a leisurely walk, and is also a very nice place for a picture. Given that the bridge connects the Parc de Bercy to the Bibliot√®que Nationals de France, its proximity to many well-known attractions makes it a prime location for those wanting to explore the beautiful city of Paris. I also found the bridge‚Äôs history interesting, as it is the first bridge built in the 21st century and was actually erected in the honor of a woman, which I was pleased to hear.
Super for hanging around and have a drink by the seine at "la playe" et oui c est Paris !! üòä ‚Ä¶
More than a bridge; ideal in Summer time to fully enjoy the Bercy garden, the French National Library terraces, as well as the Seine's borders
I think it the most modern bridge in Paris. From here to Eiffel Tower along Seine is the best way to run. but if you run or walk, you had better to choose the left side of Seine.

I came here to dance and learn latin dances for free, good music, nice people and joy ! I liked it. But, its not always that they come here, there is a planning and everytime they fix the date and place to meet and dance.
